dt: {bc}a large widely distributed rough-scaled scombroid fish ({it}Lepidocybium flavobrunneum{/it}) that resembles a mackerel

et: Spanish, literally, scholar, from Medieval Latin {it}scholaris{/it} {ma}{mat|scholar|}{/ma}
shortdef: a large widely distributed rough-scaled scombroid fish (Lepidocybium flavobrunneum) that resembles a mackerel
